name: Earthshine
detailed_description:
A story about two travelers who cross the Desert - the last obstacle to the Fields of Oblivion. These fields are amazing in their glory Beautiful flowers never wither, and the stars never fade there. Time has no power over that place. There are legends that these flowers cure any wounds, resurrect the dead, or grant immortality. But there is no evidence of these rumors...


Game features:
- 1-2 hours of gameplay;
- Non-linear passage;
- Specific visual style;
- The magical atmosphere in which legends of many nations merged.
- And of course, love.


Want to know why our heroes want to reach the Fields?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel atom Z3xx (Silvermont)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Series. 1280x720 or better required
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Devices compartible Direct Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit ver)
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or Nvidia (VRAM 1GB or better). Recommended 1920x1080
  • Sound Card: Sound Devices compartible Direct Sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compatible
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
